texts.name: Mithra
texts.biography: Hidden in woods near the land of Deyja, Mithra combines cunning and sorcery to outmaneuver her foes. Her skills in espionage and manipulation make her a formidable asset to Refuge, striking from the shadows with deadly precision.

specialty.name: Enchanter
specialty.description:
{Enchanter}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Enchanters for each level attained after 5th level.
